drop table users;
drop table users_unverified;
drop table elanejung;
drop table manthan;
drop table breakfree;

CREATE TABLE users(
	ID varchar(100) PRIMARY KEY,
	elanId varchar(10),
	name text NOT NULL,
	password text NOT NULL,
	college text NOT NULL,
	mobile varchar(13) NOT NULL,
	email varchar(100) NOT NULL,
	registered_events text
);

create table users_unverified(
	email varchar(100) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
	name text NOT NULL,
	college text NOT NULL,
	mobile varchar(13) NOT NULL,
	passwords text NOT NULL
);

create table elanejung(
	ID varchar(100) PRIMARY KEY,
	elanId varchar(10),
	email varchar(100) NOT NULL
);

create table manthan(
    ID varchar(100) PRIMARY KEY,
    elanId varchar(10),
    email varchar(100) NOT NULL
);

create table breakfree(
    ID varchar(100) PRIMARY KEY,
    elanId varchar(10),
    email varchar(100) NOT NULL
);

create table looseyourfeet(
    ID varchar(100) PRIMARY KEY,
    elanId varchar(10),
    email varchar(100) NOT NULL
);
